rules_text:
Durkon has protection from Undead. [i](Zombies, Skeletons, Spirits, Vampires and Liches are Undead)[/i]
Whenever Durkon, The Cleric attacks, tap target creature defending player controls for each creature in your party. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
